attributes.action: SAVE WOOLSTON HIGH SCHOOL - W, P A & J HANKEY
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE HEART OF THE WOOLSTON COMMUNITY WILL BE DESTROYED IF THE LOCAL COMMUNITY SCHOOL IS CLOSED.  MANY FRIENDS AND GENERATIONS OF PEOPLE HAVE BEEN TAUGHT AT THIS SCHOOL AND ALL WANT THE TEACHING TO CONTINUE. NOT ONLY LOCAL PEOPLE BUT NEW FAMILIES MOVING INTO THE AREA OR LIVING WITHIN CLOSE PROXIMITY.  NOT ONLY DOES WOOLSTON HIGH SERVE THE CHILDREN AND PARENTS BUT A WIDE SPECTRUM OF PEOPLE YOUNG AND OLD, ALL FAITHS AND CULTURES WHOM HAVE SINCERE RESPECT FOR EACH OTHER AS PRACTISED WITHIN THE COMMUNITY.  PLEASE RECONSIDER THE PROPOSALS PUT FORWARD TO DATE IN FAVOUR OF KEEPING THE SCHOOL OPEN AND REDISCOVER THE HOPE FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS TO COME WITHIN THIS AREA OF WARRINGTON.  BE SENSIBLE AND PRO ACTIVE KEEP IT OPEN FOR ALL.

rejection.details: Please rewrite in upper and lower case.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
